revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=FriendlyARM |model=NanoPi M |revision=1 (512MB) |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |price=11 |est_release_date=03/2016 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=H3 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=0 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646Q-BCK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=3 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=1A 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8008B;;1;,,, 2A 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator; Silergy;SY8089A;;2;,,, 3A 500KHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8113B;;1;,,, 5.5V 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280;;1; |flags=HDMI 1.4, Micro SD Card slot, CVBS header, IR receiver, DVP Camera Interface, microphone, GPIO, SPI, I2C |stock_boot=U-Boot;2017.11; |stock_os=Linux;4.14.111;FriendlyCore (UbuntuCore 20.04 LTS) |tp_firmware=FriendlyWrt, Debian, Armbian, DietPi |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=pi |default_pass=pi }} {{TagLine|Single-board Computer}} :[https://wiki.friendlyarm.com/wiki/index.php/NanoPi_M1 Support wiki]
''"FRIENDLYARM", "NanoPi M1" and "1603B"'' are silkscreened between the RAM chips.
*[https://linux-sunxi.org/FriendlyARM_NanoPi_M1 ''FriendlyARM NanoPi M1'' on '''SunXi'''] • [[NanoPi M1]] • [[NanoPi M1 Plus]] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2016/03/22/nanopi-m1-allwinner-h3-development-board-with-hdmi-cvbs-ethernet-and-3-usb-ports-sells-for-11-sort-of/ ''NanoPi M1 Allwinner H3 Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/quad-core-11dollar-hacker-board-runs-linux-on-allwinner-h3/ ''Quad-core $11 hacker SBC runs Linux on Allwinner H3'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' H3 (Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A7) @1.2 GHz *GPU: ''Mali-400MP2'' @600MHz (OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG 1.1) *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) SDRAM • [[Samsung]] K4B2G1646Q *Onboard Storage: TF card (64GB)/MMC card slot *Ports: 1x FE LAN, 3x USB 2.0 ports, 1x microUSB OTG
{{WikiDevi.Wi-Cat.RU:Network/NanoPi models}}
==Images== <gallery> File:NanoPi M1 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:NanoPi M1 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
